name: MissionMangal
description: Mission Mangal Video Game. A game Based on the Movie "Mission Mangal" and The Mars Orbiter Mission(M.O.M). This game is a very simple game but expresses the proud of the Indian Space Research Organisation's Success by launching the Mangalyan with PSLV Rocket. This is game is a simulator or animation 'n' observation project for the India's Mars Mangalyan mission. After the first to scenes, the controls gets enabled. Use W to boost, S to slow, A & D for Left and right.
